info.+content: Inspired by the aesthetics of design and the freedom of flying, Jiro Horikoshi pursues a life dedicated to the creation of a beautiful aircraft. He labors from his childhood, filled with dreams of engineering, to adulthood as he creates an elegant, flightworthy plane—the Mitsubishi A6M Zero—that eventually is used for something quite different than he expected: war.
"Hikōki Gumo" (ひこうき雲; "Contrail") by Yumi Matsutoya
"Das gibt's nur einmal" by Hideaki Anno & Morio Kazama & Stephen Alpert
